message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
Thank you for offering the product. I appreciate the item, but I was hoping to pay less than $120. Can we negotiate a price closer to $100?
I understand you're looking to pay less, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. Would you be willing to pay $110 for the product?
I'm glad you're willing to meet me halfway. Considering my budget, I think $105 would be a fair price for the product.
I'm getting closer to your price, but I'm not quite there yet. I can do $108, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to lower the price. Considering my budget, I think $107 would be a fair price for the product.
I'm getting close to meeting you in the middle. I can do $109, but that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at $109, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options
Considering the value I see in the product, I think $108 would be a fair price for us to agree upon.
I've already offered you $109 and you rejected it. I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I'm going to have to consider other options. Let's call it a day, Bob.
